text:
Late 2016

James proposed to Pippa at the Lake District, a national park in northwest England, with an art deco-style Asscher cut diamond ring on July 17. Carole and Michael Middleton said in a statement, "They make a wonderful couple and we wish them every happiness together."

In December, James and Pippa set at date for their big day. Signaling the seriousness of their relationship, James was also invited to join Pippa and the Middleton family at a Christmas Day service at St. Mary Magdalene Church in Sandringham with The Royal Family.
title: A Timeline of Pippa Middleton and James Matthews’ Relationship
